summary: Defines abstract base classes that form the core client‑side framework for federated learning, handling lifecycle phases, statistical summarization of local data, and providing a platform‑agnostic interface for training, model parameter access, and performance evaluation.
business_intent: Enable developers to implement custom client algorithms in a consistent, extensible way for federated learning systems, ensuring proper setup, teardown, data statistics collection, and standardized interaction with model parameters and training logic.
